message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to start with a price of $900000 for the product.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $700000 for the product. I believe this price is more in line with my budget and would be a fair deal for both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm afraid I need to make a profit on this deal, and $700000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $950000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you and my minimum requirement.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counter with $750000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me and your initial offer.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I still need to make a profit on this deal. I'm willing to compromise, but $750000 is still a bit too low for me. I'll meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $975000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to me and your budget.

I understand your concerns, Alice, and I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'll make a final counteroffer of $850000 for the product. I believe this is the highest price I'm willing to pay, considering the value of the product to me and your initial offer.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I've already compromised quite a bit, and $850000 is still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to be closer to my minimum price. I'll counter with $975000, which is the lowest price I'm willing to accept. If we can't agree on this price, I'll have to consider other options.
